name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior PCB Engineer with a strong background in **Altium**, **Cadstar**, and **Allegro PCB Designer**, I possess over 8 years of experience in PCB design and analysis. My technical expertise includes **PCB Design**, **Signal Integrity**, **Power Integrity**, and **EMC**, complemented by a proficient understanding of **IPC Standards**. I excel in **Heat Analysis** and have hands-on experience with **Flex Circuits** and **Rigid-Flex Circuits**. My analytical skills and problem-solving abilities enable me to deliver optimal solutions that meet industry standards.

In addition to my technical capabilities, I have a proven track record of mentoring junior engineers, fostering a collaborative work environment, and delivering projects on time. I have excellent English communication skills, facilitating effective collaboration with cross-functional teams. With a passion for innovation and continuous improvement, I am committed to driving advancements in PCB engineering.

Fostered mentorship among junior engineers, enhancing team competency in PCB design tools and techniques, with **5** engineers benefiting from structured guidance and development sessions.
Effectively communicated with stakeholders in **English**, articulating technical insights and updates, which enhanced project collaboration and client satisfaction across **10** major projects.
Conducted regular design reviews and quality assessments to ensure adherence to EMC specifications, leading to a **100% success rate** in product audits.
Initiated process improvements that reduced design cycle time by **20%**, significantly enhancing the team's responsiveness to project demands.

Applied advanced **PCB Design** principles and tools such as **Altium**, **Cadstar**, and **Allegro PCB Designer** to develop and optimize complex printed circuit boards, achieving enhanced performance and reliability.
Mentored junior engineers in PCB design and industry best practices, fostering a collaborative environment and elevating team capabilities through effective knowledge transfer and communication.
Conducted thorough **EMC**, **Heat Analysis**, and **Signal Integrity** assessments, optimizing designs to ensure compliance with **IPC Standards** and improve functionality in various applications.
Engineered **Rigid-Flex Circuits** and **Flex Circuits** solutions that reduced production costs by **15%** while maintaining high-quality standards and meeting project timelines.
Demonstrated strong analytical and problem-solving skills by identifying potential design flaws and implementing effective solutions that decreased project rework by **25%**.
Produced technical documentation and reports in fluent English, effectively communicating complex concepts and designs to clients and stakeholders, ensuring alignment and understanding.

Performed detailed signal and power integrity analysis, ensuring reliable functionality and performance in complex circuit designs across both **Rigid-Flex Circuits** and traditional PCBs.
